get.summary: Implements Csm operations Api to exposes the list of available Csm Apis under the resource provider
get.description: Description for Implements Csm operations Api to exposes the list of available Csm Apis under the resource provider

schema.description: Collection of Azure resource manager operation metadata.

items.description: Description of an operation available for Microsoft.Web resource provider.

display.description: Meta data about operation used for display in portal.

properties.description: Properties available for a Microsoft.Web resource provider operation.

serviceSpecification.description: Resource metrics service provided by Microsoft.Insights resource provider.

items.description: Definition of a single resource metric.

Dimension of a resource metric. For e.g. instance specific HTTP requests for a web app, 
where instance name is dimension of the metric HTTP request
Retention policy of a resource metric.
Log Definition of a single resource metric.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

post.summary: Check if a domain is available for registration.
post.description: Description for Check if a domain is available for registration.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

available.description: true if domain can be purchased using CreateDomain API; otherwise, false.

domainType.description: Valid values are Regular domain: Azure will charge the full price of domain registration, SoftDeleted: Purchasing this domain will simply restore it and this operation will not cost anything.

get.summary: Get all domains in a subscription.
get.description: Description for Get all domains in a subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

items.description: Information about a domain.

kind.description: Kind of resource. If the resource is an app, you can refer to https://github.com/Azure/app-service-linux-docs/blob/master/Things_You_Should_Know/kind_property.md#app-service-resource-kind-reference for details supported values for kind.

address2.description: The second line of the Address. Optional.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the address.

state.description: The state or province for the address.

address2.description: The second line of the Address. Optional.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the address.

state.description: The state or province for the address.

address2.description: The second line of the Address. Optional.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the address.

state.description: The state or province for the address.

address2.description: The second line of the Address. Optional.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the address.

state.description: The state or province for the address.

privacy.description: true if domain privacy is enabled for this domain; otherwise, false.

lastRenewedTime.description: Timestamp when the domain was renewed last time.

autoRenew.description: true if the domain should be automatically renewed; otherwise, false.

readyForDnsRecordManagement.description: true if Azure can assign this domain to App Service apps; otherwise, false. This value will be true if domain registration status is active and it is hosted on name servers Azure has programmatic access to.

managedHostNames.description: All hostnames derived from the domain and assigned to Azure resources.

items.description: Details of a hostname derived from a domain.

siteNames.description: List of apps the hostname is assigned to. This list will have more than one app only if the hostname is pointing to a Traffic Manager.

azureResourceName.description: Name of the Azure resource the hostname is assigned to. If it is assigned to a Traffic Manager then it will be the Traffic Manager name otherwise it will be the app name.

azureResourceType.description: Type of the Azure resource the hostname is assigned to.

agreementKeys.description: List of applicable legal agreement keys. This list can be retrieved using ListLegalAgreements API under TopLevelDomain resource.

agreedAt.description: Timestamp when the agreements were accepted.

domainNotRenewableReasons.description: Reasons why domain is not renewable.

targetDnsType.description: Target DNS type (would be used for migration)

postParameterValue.description: Post parameter value. Client should use 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' encoding for this value.

parameters.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).

schema.description: Collection of top-level domain legal agreements.

items.description: Legal agreement for a top level domain.

url.description: URL where a copy of the agreement details is hosted.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

address2.description: The second line of the Address. Optional.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the address.

state.description: The state or province for the address.

Contact.description:
Contact information for domain registration. If 'Domain Privacy' option is not selected then the contact information is made publicly available through the Whois 
directories as per ICANN requirements.

address2.description: The second line of the Address. Optional.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the address.

state.description: The state or province for the address.

kind.description: Kind of resource. If the resource is an app, you can refer to https://github.com/Azure/app-service-linux-docs/blob/master/Things_You_Should_Know/kind_property.md#app-service-resource-kind-reference for details supported values for kind.

address2.description: The second line of the Address. Optional.

address2.description: The second line of the Address. Optional.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the address.

state.description: The state or province for the address.

privacy.description: true if domain privacy is enabled for this domain; otherwise, false.

lastRenewedTime.description: Timestamp when the domain was renewed last time.

autoRenew.description: true if the domain should be automatically renewed; otherwise, false.

readyForDnsRecordManagement.description: true if Azure can assign this domain to App Service apps; otherwise, false. This value will be true if domain registration status is active and it is hosted on name servers Azure has programmatic access to.

managedHostNames.description: All hostnames derived from the domain and assigned to Azure resources.

items.description: Details of a hostname derived from a domain.

siteNames.description: List of apps the hostname is assigned to. This list will have more than one app only if the hostname is pointing to a Traffic Manager.

azureResourceName.description: Name of the Azure resource the hostname is assigned to. If it is assigned to a Traffic Manager then it will be the Traffic Manager name otherwise it will be the app name.

azureResourceType.description: Type of the Azure resource the hostname is assigned to.

agreementKeys.description: List of applicable legal agreement keys. This list can be retrieved using ListLegalAgreements API under TopLevelDomain resource.

agreedAt.description: Timestamp when the agreements were accepted.

domainNotRenewableReasons.description: Reasons why domain is not renewable.

targetDnsType.description: Target DNS type (would be used for migration)

available.description: true if domain can be purchased using CreateDomain API; otherwise, false.

domainType.description: Valid values are Regular domain: Azure will charge the full price of domain registration, SoftDeleted: Purchasing this domain will simply restore it and this operation will not cost anything.

items.description: Information about a domain.

kind.description: Kind of resource. If the resource is an app, you can refer to https://github.com/Azure/app-service-linux-docs/blob/master/Things_You_Should_Know/kind_property.md#app-service-resource-kind-reference for details supported values for kind.

DomainPurchaseConsent.description: Domain purchase consent object, representing acceptance of applicable legal agreements.

keywords.description: Keywords to be used for generating domain recommendations.

privacy.description: If true, then the top level domain supports domain privacy; otherwise, false.

TopLevelDomainAgreementOption.description: Options for retrieving the list of top level domain legal agreements.

includePrivacy.description: If true, then the list of agreements will include agreements for domain privacy as well; otherwise, false.

forTransfer.description: If true, then the list of agreements will include agreements for domain transfer as well; otherwise, false.
